body_html: Okay, I was just too tired yesterday to remember that the complex specialization for atomicAdd relies on the double specialization. I switched the order, i.e. moved the complex specialization below the special case for double and cuda_arch < 600. Now compilation for cuda_arch 5.1 works. Sorry for the confusion! Could you trigger the tests again? Thanks!

body: Okay, I was just too tired yesterday to remember that the complex specialization for atomicAdd relies on the double specialization. I switched the order, i.e. moved the complex specialization below the special case for double and cuda_arch < 600. Now compilation for cuda_arch 5.1 works. Sorry for the confusion!
